dcterms:creator: Quoc V Le
Navdeep Jaitly
Geoffrey E Hinton
dcterms:description: The sequential MNIST data consists of presenting each row of a 28 Ã— 28 MNIST digit grey-scale image as input at a single time step, leading to a sequence of length 28 for the entire image. The task is to classify the sequence into one of the ten classes.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Shiyu Chang
Yang Zhang
Wei Han
Mo Yu
Xiaoxiao Guo
Wei Tan
Xiaodong Cui
Michael Witbrock
Mark A Hasegawa-Johnson
Thomas S Huang
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 60000 32 color images in 10 classes, with 6000 images per class. The sequential CIFAR-10 is constructed by a similar process in scanline order from the CIFAR-10 images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: Pete Warden
dcterms:description: The Google Speech Commands dataset contains 65000 one-second long utterances of 10 short words, designed to help train and evaluate keyword spotting systems in the presence of background noise or unrelated speech.
dcterms:title: Google Speech Commands
